repos_data.description: Evidently is ​​an open-source ML and LLM observability framework. Evaluate, test, and monitor any AI-powered system or data pipeline. From tabular data to Gen AI. 100+ metrics.

Deepchecks: Tests for Continuous Validation of ML Models & Data. Deepchecks is a holistic open-source solution for all of your AI & ML validation needs, enabling to thoroughly test your data and models from research to production.
⚓ Eurybia monitors model drift over time and securizes model deployment with data validation
